18 
19 #ifndef COMPANION_ERROR_H
20 #define COMPANION_ERROR_H
21 
22 namespace Companion {
23 
24  namespace Error {
25 
27  enum class Code {
28  image_not_found,
29  dimension_error,
30  template_dimension_error,
31  feature_detector_not_found,
32  descriptor_extractor_not_found,
33  descriptor_matcher_not_found,
34  wrong_model_type,
35  invalid_companion_config,
36  video_src_not_set,
37  invalid_video_src,
38  no_image_processing_algo_set,
39  no_handler_set
40  };
41 
47  inline std::string getError(Code code) {
48 
49  std::string error = "Unknown Error";
50 
51  switch (code) {
52  case Code::descriptor_extractor_not_found:
53  error = "Given descriptor not supported.";
54  break;
55  case Code::descriptor_matcher_not_found:
56  error = "Given descriptor matcher not supported.";
57  break;
58  case Code::dimension_error:
59  error = "Dimensions not equal.";
60  break;
61  case Code::feature_detector_not_found:
62  error = "Given feature not supported.";
63  break;
64  case Code::image_not_found:
65  error = "Could not open or find image.";
66  break;
67  case Code::template_dimension_error:
68  error = "Template size must be smaller or equal than image.";
69  break;
70  case Code::wrong_model_type:
71  error = "This model type class is not supported for this image recognition algorithm.";
72  break;
73  case Code::invalid_companion_config:
74  error = "Invalid companion configuration.";
75  break;
76  case Code::video_src_not_set:
77  error = "Video source is not set.";
78  break;
79  case Code::invalid_video_src:
80  error = "Video src is not obtainable.";
81  break;
82  case Code::no_image_processing_algo_set:
83  error = "No image processing algorithm is used.";
84  break;
85  case Code::no_handler_set:
86  error = "No callback handler set";
87  break;
88  }
89 
90  return error;
91  }
92  }
93 
94 }
95 
96 #endif //COMPANION_ERROR_H
